minvakt.controller

Class ChangeRequestController

  • java.lang.Object
    • minvakt.controller.ChangeRequestController

  • @RestController
 @RequestMapping(value="/requestchange")
public class ChangeRequestController
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by OlavH on 23-Jan-17. Controller to handle change-requests. AKA requests to change shifts from one user to another
